abstract: The gloom pervading the financial markets and the business climate has reached the land of innovation.
snippet: The gloom pervading the financial markets and the business climate has reached the land of innovation.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO  Housing prices in Silicon Valley remain defiantly high. New BMWs and Saabs cruise Highway 101. But for the first time there are signs that the current economic downturn is taking its toll on the country’s cradle of technology and innovation.

headline.main: Economy Has Become a Drag on Silicon Valley

byline.original: By Matt Richtel and Brad Stone

abstract: Another shot has been fired in the increasingly bitter battle between Microsoft and Yahoo.
lead_paragraph: Another shot has been fired in the increasingly bitter battle between Microsoft and Yahoo.

headline.main: Yahoo to Announce Test Partnership With Google

abstract: If Yahoo let Google sell ads on its search engine, its revenue might increase by 60 percent. But there are likely to be antitrust questions. One way around this would be for Yahoo to create an open system for any company to sell ads on its search pages, a competition Google is likely to win.
snippet: If Yahoo let Google sell ads on its search engine, its revenue might increase by 60 percent. But there are likely to be antitrust questions. One way around this would be for Yahoo to create an open system for any company to sell ads on its search ...
lead_paragraph: Yahoo said Wednesday that it would test Google’s search ads for the next two weeks as part of its consideration of potential ways it could fend off Microsoft’s hostile takeover offer.

headline.main: The Open Way Yahoo Could Do a Search Deal With Google
